capability.name: Ecm And Dcm
capability.definition: Supports the specification, pricing and issuance of equity and debt (bond) primary capital market products for corporate financing services
capability.role: The service domain provides fulfillment services for the issuance of primary market equity and debt capital market instruments for corporate customers. It supports both private and public (IPO) placements and covers the specification, pricing and placement activities associated with issuance. (it does not include secondary market trading of the instrument)
capability.example: A corporate customer raises capital through issuing corporate debt in the private capital markets

key_features.name: Determining and specifying the equity/debt instrument
key_features.description: Enables determining and specifying the equity/debt instrument to support supports the specification, pricing and issuance of equity and debt (bond) primary capital market products for corporate financing services

key_features.name: Prospectus and pricing
key_features.description: Enables prospectus and pricing to support supports the specification, pricing and issuance of equity and debt (bond) primary capital market products for corporate financing services

key_features.name: Road show and placement
key_features.description: Enables road show and placement to support supports the specification, pricing and issuance of equity and debt (bond) primary capital market products for corporate financing services
